comment.body:
This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has been open for 4 days with no activity.
Unfortunately, our resources are limited and we can not always take the time to respond to requests about websites that are not popular enough. The issue will be closed if no further activity occurs.
Please note, that AdGuard Filters is an open-source project that is used by different content blockers and we welcome contributions. If you have some technical knowledge about how websites work, you are welcome to create a pull request following [these instructions](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md).

issue.title: com.dubox.drive

labels.name: Stale
labels.description: The issue is considered as obsolete

issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] This site DOES NOT contain sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [X] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

AdGuard for Android

### AdGuard version

4.5

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Missed analytics or tracker

### Which browser(s) do you use?

the problem is with app, not a site

### Which device do you use?

Mobile

### Where is the problem encountered?

https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.dubox.drive

### Ad Blocking

AdGuard Base filter, AdGuard Mobile Ads filter, EasyList

### Privacy

AdGuard URL Tracking filter, AdGuard Tracking Protection filter, EasyPrivacy

### Social Widgets

_No response_

### Annoyances

_No response_

### Security

_No response_

### Other

_No response_

### DNS filters

_No response_

### Language-specific

_No response_

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

_No response_

### Add your comment and screenshots

trk.svr-algorix.com
trk.rixengine.com
myaudioads.com

### Privacy

- [X] I agree to follow this condition

issue.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [https://a.app.qq.com/o/simple.jsp?pkgname=com.galaxy.stock&g_f=1000047](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fa.app.qq.com%2Fo%2Fsimple.jsp%3Fpkgname%3Dcom.galaxy.stock%26g_f%3D1000047) ### Comment > Galaxy Securities is a large-scale brokerage firm in Chinese mainland. The latest version of android will show signs of network interruption when adgurad is turned on. After it is turned off, the problem will disappear. As a financial software, it should not be affected. This is an app application that I need to visit every day, and I hope to solve it as soon as possible. Username: `@liuzhuohua` ### Screenshots

issue.body:

Even re-loading the page doesn't fix it. However as soon as Adguard is disabled amazon website immediately works correctly. Username: `@jayzee78` ### Screenshots

comment.body:
This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has been open for 4 days with no activity.
Unfortunately, our resources are limited and we can not always take the time to respond to requests about websites that are not popular enough. The issue will be closed if no further activity occurs.
Please note, that AdGuard Filters is an open-source project that is used by different content blockers and we welcome contributions. If you have some technical knowledge about how websites work, you are welcome to create a pull request following [these instructions](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md).
